title: Bournemouth not looking to sell Benik Afobe in January
description: Bournemouth are yet to receive any bids for Benik Afobe and Sky Sports News understands they have no interest in selling.
content: The news follows reports linking the 24-year-old forward with a move to Watford.The Hornets are reportedly open to offers for their striker Troy Deeney, and view Afobe as a possible replacement.However, Bournemouth do not want to part with Afobe, who they signed from Wolves in January 2016.Afobe came through the academy at Arsenal and spent time on loan with a series of clubs before he was signed by Wolves.He has made 20 appearances this season, with just the one goal to his name so far.
